sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="ab3600e01b913010a13dea03b24bcb26" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Pokemon Championships Registration">d9fc6de21b613010a13dea03b24bcb46</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:56c3f9ea1b613010a13dea03b24bcbce</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Match Games to Format</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	g_form.clearOptions('game_version');
	
	if(newValue=='tcg'){
		g_form.addOption('game_version', 'pkmn_tcg', "Pokemon Trading Card Game");
	}
	
	else if(newValue=='pokken_tournament'){
		g_form.addOption('game_version', 'pokken_tournament_dx', "Pokken Tournament DX");
	}
	
	else if(newValue=='vgc'){
		g_form.addOption('game_version', 'pkmn_sword', "Pokemon Sword Version");
		g_form.addOption('game_version', 'pkmn_shield', "Pokemon Shield Version");
	}
	
	

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 17:20:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>ab3600e01b913010a13dea03b24bcb26</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>04d6ce6a1ba13010a13dea03b24bcbb2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Match Games to Format</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_04d6ce6a1ba13010a13dea03b24bcbb2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 14:29:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var selectedDateNum = getDateFromFormat(newValue,g_user_date_format); 
   var today_date = new Date();
   var today_dateStr = formatDate(today_date, g_user_date_format); 
   var todayDateNum = getDateFromFormat(today_dateStr, g_user_date_format);
   if(selectedDateNum > todayDateNum) {
     g_form.showErrorBox("date_of_birth","Date of Birth cannot be a future date.",true);
    } else {
      g_form.hideFieldMsg('date_of_birth',true);
    }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jeff</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 16:55:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>ab3600e01b913010a13dea03b24bcb26</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1e11c6621ba13010a13dea03b24bcb15</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>No Future Birthdate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1e11c6621ba13010a13dea03b24bcb15</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jeff</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 17:02:54</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
